channel.title: Forum help
channel.description: how do u link your server to a forum that you made ? :confused:

item.title: Forum help
item.dc:creator: @Kalphiter Kalphiter
item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

joeyjoe9876:

i have full access i made teh forum -.- i just need to know how to connect it to my server so people can register that way lol

Can you go into the database, change usernames, passwords, or whatever NOT THROUGH THE ACTUAL FORUM?

Can you edit PHP files?

Can you modify any file you want in it?

I don’t think so.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum help
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Kalphiter, post:7, topic:243531”][quote author=joeyjoe9876 link=topic=319847.msg2533748#msg2533748 date=1226623402]
i have a forum i just dont know how to make it so when people register on the forum they also register on the server
[/quote]If you listened, you would have learned that you have full access.

If you don’t have full access, you can’t delete a single file on your forum(including every one).[/quote]

He means that you have to download the database, the hoster (most likely smf) and the rest of the stuff required to run your forum off of your computer. You can’t link your server to smfforfree, considering it isn’t ran from your computer as well as your private server.

Hopefully you don’t mean you have full access to smfforfree. Because you don’t.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum help
item.dc:creator: @Kalphiter Kalphiter
item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

[quote=“joeyjoe9876, post:5, topic:243531”]i have a forum i just dont know how to make it so when people register on the forum they also register on the server[/quote]If you listened, you would have learned that you have full access.

If you don’t have full access, you can’t delete a single file on your forum(including every one).

Read full topic
